entry.title: Yet another testing post
entry.content:
This exists only to test some more functions like Prev and Next buttons.

And I would also like to write some code segments. begin say hello end

entry.title: I start to blog.
entry.content:
This is actually a testing post. You are welcome to reply under this post.

I am quite annoyed with jekyll, as it deleted all my repository when I set the output directory as root of this repo. >_<
